John 6 63 Le Devlesko Duxo del o traio: o stato chi mol kanchi. Le vorbi kai phendem tumenge, won si duxo ai traio. 
John 6 64 Numa si mashkar tumende uni kai chi pachan." Ke O Jesus zhanglia de mai anglal kon si kodola kai chi pachanpe, ai kon si kodo kai purhila les. 
John 6 65 Wo phendia, "Sostar phendem tumenge, ke khonik nashtil te avel mande te na tsirdela les O Del mande."
John 6 66 Ai de katar kodia vriama but anda leske disipluria geletar, ai chi mai zhanas lesa.
John 6 67 Ai O Jesus phendia le desh u dui disiplonge, "Ai tume, chi mangen vi tume te zhantar?"
John 6 68 Ai O Simon Petri phendia leske, "Devla, kaste te zhasas ame? Si tu le vorbi kai den o traio le rhaiosko. 
John 6 69 Ai akana pachas ai zhanas kai tu san O Kristo, O Swunto Shav le Devlesko.
John 6 70 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Pate chi alosardem tumen me, le desh u duien? Ai iek anda tumende si iek beng!" 
John 6 71 Wo delas duma pa Judas Iscariot o shav le Simonosko. Ke wo sas kai trobulas te purhil les, iek andal desh u dui.
John 7 1 Pala kodia O Jesus phiradia ande Galilee; ke chi mangel te phirel ande Judea, ke le Zhiduvuria rodenas te mudaren les. 
John 7 2 Ai O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo le Tabernacles pasholas. 
John 7 3 Leske phral phende leske, "Zhatar katse, ai zha ando Judea, kashte che disipluria te sai dikhen le mirakluria kai tu keres. 
John 7 4 Khonik chi garavel so kerel te mangel te sikadiol. Te keres kadalendar dieli, sikav tu ka sa la lumiake!" 
John 7 5 Ke chi leske chache phral chi pachanaspe ande leste.
John 7 6 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Murhi vriama chi avili inker; numa tumari vriama sagda gata la. 
John 7 7 E lumia nashti gretsol tumen, numa gretsol man, ke phenav pa late, ke laki buchi so kerel si nasul. 
John 7 8 Zhantar tume ka Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, me chi zhav ka kado Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo inker, ke murhi vriama chi avili inker. 
John 7 9 Wo phendia lenge kadala vorbi ai beshlo ando Galilee.
John 7 10 Kana leske phral gele ka Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, antunchi O Jesus gelo, vi wo numa na angle narodo, numa sar chordanes. 
John 7 11 Le Zhiduvuria rodenas les ka O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo. Ai phende, "Kai lo?"
John 7 12 But manush denas duma pala leste ando narodo. Uni phende, "Wo si iek manush o lasho." Aver phenenas, "Nichi." Wo atsavel le manushen." 
John 7 13 Numa khonik chi delas duma pa leste angla manush, ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria.
John 7 14 Karing mashkar O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo O Jesus gelo ande tampla, ai sicharelas. 
John 7 15 Le Zhiduvuria chudinaspe, ai phenenas, "Sar wo zhanel kadia but kana shoxar chi sichilo."
John 7 16 O Jesus phenel lenge, "O sicharimos kai dav nai murho, numa avel katar O Del kai tradia ma. 
John 7 17 Te vari kon te kerel so mangel O Del, zhanela ke so sicharav avel katar O Del, vai te dava duma anda mande. 
John 7 18 Kon del duma pestar rodel pesko barimos: numa kodo kai rodel o barimos kodolesko kai tradia les, kodo si chacho, ai nai xoxaimos ande leste. 
John 7 19 O Moses dia tume o zakono? Numa khonik anda tumende chi keren o zakono. Sostar roden tume te mudaren ma?"
John 7 20 Le manush phende leske, "Tut si tu iek beng ande tute! Kon rodel te mudarel tu?""
John 7 21 O Jesus phenel lenge, "Kerdem iek diela, ai savorhe chudisailian. 
John 7 22 Ke o Moses dia tumen o zakono te shinen pe murshen (na ke avel katar o Moses, numa katar tumare phure), ai tume shinen ieke manushes po dies O Savatone. 
John 7 23 Te sai shinen ieke manushes po dies O Savatone, te phagen o zakono le Mosesosko. Sostar xoliavon pe mande, ke sastiardem ieke manushes sa antrego po dies O Savatone? 
John 7 24 Aterdion te keren kris pala so dikhen avrial po manush, aven vorta ai chache ande tumare kris kana keren la."
John 7 25 Uni manush anda o Jerusalem phende, "Pate nai kado o manush kai rodas te mudaras les? 
John 7 26 Dikh! Del duma angla savorhenge, ai khonik chi phenel leske kanchi! Amborim ke le bare kai poronchin zhanen ke wo si O Kristo? 
John 7 27 Numa kana O Kristo avela, khonik chi zhanela katar avel, numa ame zhanas katar avel kado manush."
John 7 28 Sar O Jesus sicharelas ande tampla, tsipisardia, "Tume zhanen ma, ai zhanen katar sim: ai chi avilem anda mande, numa kodo kai tradia ma wo si chacho, ai tume chi zhanen les. 
John 7 29 Numa me zhanav les; ke avav lestar, ai wo tradia ma."
John 7 30 Antunchi rodenas sar te len les; numa khonik chi thode o vas pe leste, ke lesko chaso chi avilo inker. 
John 7 31 Numa but mashkar o narodo pachanaspe ande leste, ai phende, "Kana O Kristo avela, sai kerela mai but mirakluria sar kerdia kado?"
John 7 32 Le Farizeanuria ashunde ke o narodo mothon kodala dieli pa Jesus; ai le Farizeanuria ai le bare rasha trade penge zhandari te len les.
John 7 33 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Me beshav tumensa mai xantsi vriama, ai porme zhavtar karing kodo kai tradia ma. 
John 7 34 Tume rodena ma, numa chi arakhena ma, ke nashti avena kai zhava."
John 7 35 Le Zhiduvuria phenen mashkar pende, "Kai wo zhala kai chi arakhasa les? Zhala karing le foruria kai si ande Gretsia, ai sicharel le Grekone? 
John 7 36 So si kadala vorbi kai phendia, Tume rodena ma, numa chi arakhena ma, ke nashti aven kai me zhava. So znachil?"
John 7 37 O paluno Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo sas o mai baro, ai O Jesus beshelas ande punrhende ai tsipisardia, phenelas, "Te si vari kon trushalo, mek te avel mande, ai pel 
John 7 38 "Kon pachalape ande mande, sar E Vorba le Devleski phenel, pai zhuvindo hulela anda lesko ilo." 
John 7 39 O Jesus phendia pa Swunto Duxo, kodala kai pachanpe ande leste premina: ke O Swunto Duxo nai dino inker, ke O Jesus nas vazdino ando rhaio inker.
John 7 40 Kana but le manusheske ashunde leske vorbi, phenenas, "Chaches, kado manush si o profeto."
John 7 41 Aver phende, "Wo si O Kristo!" Numa aver phende, "Pate, sai Kristo avel andai Galilee! 
John 7 42 Pate o ramomos chi phendia, ke O Kristo si te avel ande vitsa le Davidoski, ai anda foro kai bushol Bethlehem, kai beshlo o David?" 
John 7 43 Anda kodia chi haliarenas mashkar pende iek fialo pala Jesus. 
John 7 44 Uni mangenas te len les, numa khonik chi thode o vas pe leste.
John 7 45 Le zhandari gele palpale ka le bare rasha ai le Farizeanuria, ai phende lenge, "Sostar tume chi andian les?"
John 7 46 Le zhandari phende lenge, "Chi iek manush chi dia duma sar kado manush!" 
John 7 47 Le Farizeanuria phushle len, "Vi tume atsardian pala leste. 
John 7 48 Pate si vari kon andal le bare kai poronchin, vai iek andal Farizeanuria kai pachanpe ande leste? 
John 7 49 Numa kodo narodo kai chi zhanen o zakono o Mosesosko, si armandine."
John 7 50 O Nicodemus sas iek baro mashkar lende; wo gelosas mai anglal te dikhel O Jesus, phendia lenge, 
John 7 51 "Amaro zakono chi kerel kris po manush mai anglal sar te ashunas les, ai te zhanas so kerdia." 
John 7 52 Won phende leske, "Vi tu san anda Galilee? Sichos o ramomos le Devlesko ai dikhesa, ke chi iek profeto avel anda Galilee.
John 7 53 Antunchi swako gelo peske khere.
John 8 1 O Jesus gelo po Plai le Maslinengo. 
John 8 2 De diminiatsi pale avilo ande tampla, ai sa le manush pashile pasha leste, ai wo beshlo tele, ai sichardia len. 
John 8 3 Ai le Gramnoturia ai le Farizeanuria andine leste ek zhuvli kai line sar kerelas kurvia: ai thode la angla le manushen. 
John 8 4 Phende leske, "Gazda, kadia zhuvli liam la sar kerelas kurvia. 
John 8 5 Ando amaro zakono, o Moses dia ame ordina te mudaras baxensa kadalatar zhuvli. Numa so phenes tu?" 
John 8 6 Won phende kadia te zumaven les, kashte te astaren les andek dosh.Numa O Jesus bandilo, ai ramolas le naiesa pe phuv, sar chi ashundia len. 
John 8 7 Sar mai mangenas te phushen les, wushtilo opre, ai phenel lenge, "Savo anda tumende kai chi kerdia shoxar bezex, wo sai shudel o pervo bax pe late. 
John 8 8 Ai pale bandilo, ai ramolas pe phuv.
John 8 9 Kana ashunde so phendia, iek po iek geletar, de katar o mai phuro ai zhi kai savorhe geletar; ai O Jesus ashilo korkorho la zhuvliasa kai beshelas angla leste. 
John 8 10 Kana O Jesus wushtilo, ai chi dikhlia khonik ferdi e zhuvli, wo phendia lake, "Zhuvlio, kai che kristatoria kai dosharenas tu? Chi iek chi dia tu kris?"
John 8 11 Woi phendia leske, "Chi iek, Gazda," ai O Jesus phenel lake, "Chi me chi dav tu pe kris. Zha, ai na mai ker bezexa."
John 8 12 O Jesus mai phendia lenge, ai phenelas, "Me sim e vediara la lumiaki. Kodo kai lelape pala mande avela les e vediara le traioski ai chi phirela shoxar ando tuniariko."
John 8 13 Le Farizeanuria phende leske, "Akana tu keres tu marturo anda tute; so phenes nai vorta."
John 8 14 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Marka ke me dav duma pa mande, so phenav si chachimos, ke me zhanav katar avilem, ai kai zhav. Numa tume chi zhanen katar avav ai kai zhav. 
John 8 15 Tumare kris si manusheske; me chi kerav kris pe khanikaste. 
John 8 16 Ai te dava kris, murhi kris chachila; ke chi sim korkorho; numa O Dat tradia ma, mansa lo. 
John 8 17 Ai ramome ande tumaro zakono, ke kana dui zhene phenen iek fielo, so phenen si chachimos. 
John 8 18 Me phenav pa mande, ai vi O Dat kai tradia ma phenel pa mande."
John 8 19 "Kai cho Dat?" phushen les. O Jesus phendia lenge, "Tume chi zhanen man vai murhe Dades. Te zhanenas man, tume zhanglianas vi murhe Dades." 
John 8 20 O Jesus phendia sa kodala vorbi, kana sichardia ande tampla, po than kai thon le love. Ai khonik chi thode vas pe leste, ke lesko chaso chi avilosas inker.
John 8 21 O Jesus mai phendia lenge, "Zhavtar, ai tume roden man, numa tume merena ande tumare bezexa; tume nashtin te aven kai me zhav."
John 8 22 Le Zhiduvuria phende, "Zhala wo te mudarelpe? Ke phenel, "Ke nashti aven kai me zhav."
John 8 23 Ai O Jesus phendia lenge, "Tume avilian katsar telal, ai me avilem katsar opral. Tume san kadala lumiake; numa me chi sim andai kadia lumia. 
John 8 24 Sa anda kodia phendem tumenge , ke merena ande tumare bezexa. Ai tume merena ande tumare bezexa te na pachana tume. 'Kon sim me'"
John 8 25 Phendia leske, "Kon san tu?" Ai O Jesus phendia lenge, 
John 8 26 "Sar phendem tumenge ando gor. But dieli si ma te phenav pa tumende, ai te kerav kris pa tumende. Numa kodo kai tradia ma si chacho, ai phenav la lumiake ferdi so ashundem lestar."
John 8 27 Won chi haliarde ke delas duma pa Dat. 
John 8 28 Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge, "Kana vazden le Shaves le Manushesko, antunchi zhanena "Kon sim me," ai ke chi kerav kanchi mandar, numa dav duma ferdi so O Dat sichardia ma. 
John 8 29 Ai kodo kai tradia ma mansa lo, ai O Dat chi meklia ma korkorho; ke me kerav so godi si leske drago. 
John 8 30 Sar dia duma kadala vorbi but pachaiepe ande leste.
John 8 31 Antunchi O Jesus phendia le Zhidovongo kai pachaiepe ande leste, "Te kerena so godi phenel murhi vorba, tume san chache murhe disipluria. 
John 8 32 Ai tume zhanena o chachimos, ai o chachimos skepisarela tumen."
John 8 33 Won phende leske, "Ame sam anda e vitsa le Abrahamoski, ai ame chi samas shoxar slugi. Sar phenes tu, "Tume skepime?"
John 8 34 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Phenav tumenge o chachimos, swako manush kai kerel o bezex si ek sluga le bezexeski. 
John 8 35 Ai e sluga chi beshel ando kher sagda, numa o Shav beshel kotse sa data. 
John 8 36 Te skepil tu O Shav, antunchi chaches avena skepime. 
John 8 37 Zhanav ke tume aven anda e vitsa katar o Abraham; numa tume roden te mudaren man, ke murhi vorba nai ande tumare ile. 
John 8 38 Me phenav so sikadia mange murho Dat; ai tume keren so phendia tumenge tumaro Dat."
John 8 39 Won phenen leske, "Amaro dat si o Abraham." O Jesus phendia lenge, "Te avilianas chaches shave le Abrahamoske, tume kerdianas sa kodola buchia kai kerdia o Abraham. 
John 8 40 Numa akana roden te mudaren ma, ek manush kai phendia tumenge o chachimos, kai ashundem katar O Del: o Abrahan chi kerdia saikfialo. 
John 8 41 Tume keren sar kerdia tumaro dat." Won phende leske, "Chi sam ame shave avereske, si ame ferdi iek Dat, O Del."
John 8 42 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Te avilino chaches O Del tumaro Dat, tumenge drago mange, ke avilem katar O Del ai akana katse sim, chi avilem anda mande, numa wo tradia man. 
John 8 43 Sostar chi haliaren so me phenav tumenge? Ke nashtin te ashunen so phenel murhi vorba. 
John 8 44 Tume san shave che dadesko o beng, ai mangen te keren so mangel tumaro dat. Wo sas ek mudardari de ando gor, ai chi beshlo shoxar ando chachimos ke nai chachimos ande leste. Kana wo del duma ek xoxaimos, wo del duma peske shavenge: ke wo si xoxamno, ai o dat le xoxaimasko. 
John 8 45 Ai ke phenav tumenge o chachimos, chi pachan man. Kon anda tumende sai phenel ke kerdem bezex? 
John 8 46 Te phenav o chachimos, sostar tume chi pachan man? 
John 8 47 Kon si le Devlesko ashunel le vorbi le Devleske. Numa tume chi san le Devleske shave, anda kodia tume chi ashunen."
John 8 48 Le Zhiduvuria phende leske, phenenas, "Chi phenas vorta kana phendiam ke tu san ek Samaritano, ai si tu iek beng ande tute?"
John 8 49 "Nai ma beng," O Jesus mai phendia, "Numa luvudiv murhe Dades, ai tume chi luvudin man. 
John 8 50 Me chi rodav luvudimos mange, numa si iek kai rodel les ai krisinil. 
John 8 51 Phenav tumenge o chachimos: Savo kai kerela so phenel murhi vorba, chi dikhela o merimos."
John 8 52 Le Zhiduvuria phende leske, "Akana ame zhanas ke si tu ek beng ande tute. O Abraham mulo, ai le profeturia mule, ai tu phenes, savo kai kerel so phenel murhi vorba, chi dikhela o merimos. 
John 8 53 Amaro dat o Abraham mulo; sai aves tu mai baro sar o Abraham? Ai le profeturia vi won mule. Kon gindis ke tu san?" 
John 8 54 O Jesus phendia, "Te luvudiv man, murho luvudimos nai kanchi: si murho Dat kai luvudil man, tume phenen ke si tumaro Del, ai tume chi zhanen les, numa me zhanav les. 
John 8 55 Te phendemas ke chi zhanav les, avilemas iek fialo sar tumende, iek xoxamno. Numa zhanav les, ai kerav so phenel leske vorba. 
John 8 56 Tumaro dat o Abraham raduisailo mai anglal te dikhel murho dies; ai wo dikhlia les, raduisailo."
John 8 57 Le Zhiduvuria phende leske, "Chi san panvardesh bershengo inker, ai phenes ke dikhlian le Abrahamos?" O Jesus phendia lenge, 
John 8 58 "Phenav tumenge o chachimos, mai anglal sar te arakhadilo o Abraham, Me simas." 
John 8 59 Pe kodia line bax te shuden pe leste, numa O Jesus garadilo ai anklisto avri anda e tampla.
John 9 1 Sar O Jesus nakhelas, wo dikhlia iekes manushes kai arakhadilo korho. 
John 9 2 Leske disipluria phushle les, "Gazda, sostar arakhadiol korho? Kon kerdia bezexa, kado manush vai leske dades vai leska da?
John 9 3 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Nai wo ai chi leske dades ai chi leska da kai kerde bezexa, numa wo si korho kashte te dichol e putiera le Devleski pe leste. 
John 9 4 Trobul te kerav e buchi kodaleske kai tradia man zhi kai o dies; e riat avela, kana khonik nashti kerela buchi. 
John 9 5 Zhi kai sim ande e lumia, me sim e vediara la lumiaki."
John 9 6 Kana phendia kadala vorbi, O Jesus chungardia tele pe phuv, ai kerdia chik peske cungaresa; porme thodia kodia chik pel iakha le korheske, 
John 9 7 ai phendia leske, "Zha, te xalav tu ando pai kai bushol Siloam." (anav kai bushol, "Tradino"). O korho manush gelo, ai xaladiape, ai avilo palpale ai dikhelas.
John 9 8 Le manush kai sas pasha leste ai kodola kai zhanenas les sar iek korhovetso, phenenas, "Nai kado kai beshelas tele ai kai mangelas?" 
John 9 9 Uni phenen, "Wo si," numa aver phenenas, "Wo miazolpe leste." Numa wo phendia, "Me sim."
John 9 10 Won phenen leske, "Sarta chire iakha phuterdile?" 
John 9 11 Wo phendia lenge, "O manush kai akharen les O Jesus kerdia chira chik, ai thodia la pe murhe iakha, ai phendia mange, "Zh ka pai kai busholas Siloam, ai xalav tu." ai gelem, ai xaladem ma, ai dikhlem.
John 9 12 Antunchi phende leske, "Kai kodo manush?" Wo phendia, "Chi zhanav."
John 9 13 Ingerde karing le Farizeanuria kodales kai sas korho. 
John 9 14 Kana O Jesus kerdia e chik ai phuterdia leske iakha sas o dies Savatone. 
John 9 15 Sa anda kodia le Farizeanuria phushle le korhes, "Sar premisardian cho dikhimos?" Ai wo phendia lenge, "Thodia chik pe murhe iakha, xaladem ma, ai akana dikhav."
John 9 16 Uni andal le Farizeanuria phende, "Kado manush chi avel katar O Del, ke chi kerel o zakono kai si Savato." Aver phenen, "Sar iek manush bezexa lo sai kerel kasave mirakluria?" Anda kodia chi haliarenas mashkar pende iek fialo.
John 9 17 Mai iek data le Farizeanuria phushen le korhes kai sastilo, "So phenes tu pa leste, kai phuterdia chire iakha?" Wo phendia lenge, "Wo si iek profeto."
John 9 18 Le Zhiduvuria chi pachanaspe ke wo sas korho, ai ke akana dikhel, zhi kai andine leske dades ai leska da. 
John 9 19 Ai phushle lendar, phenen, "Kako si tumaro shav, kai phenen ke arakhadilo korho? Sar wo dikhel akana?"
John 9 20 Leske dat ai dei phende, "Ame zhanas ke si amaro shav, ai zhanas ke arakhadilo korho. 
John 9 21 Numa chi zhanas so sai dikhel akana, ai chi zhanas kon phuterdia leske iakha. Phushen lestar, si peske bershengo , wo sai del atweto." 
John 9 22 Lesko dat ai dei denas duma kadia ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria; ke le Zhiduvuria dinepe duma mashkar pende, ke te mothona avri kon ke O Jesus si O Kristo, den les avri anda e tampla. 
John 9 23 Sa anda kodia leske dat ai dei phende, "Si peske bershengo, phushen lestar!"
John 9 24 Le Farizeanuria akharen pe duito data le manushes kai sas korho, ai phende leske, "Phen o chachimos angla Del! Ame zhanas ke kodo manush si bezexa lo."
John 9 25 Wo phendia lenge, "Chi zhanav te si ek bezexalo vai nai, numa zhanav iek diela, ke simas korho, akana dikhav."
John 9 26 Ai mai phushle les, "So kerdia tuke? Sar kerdia te phutrel che iakha?"
John 9 27 Phendia lenge, "Phendem tumenge iek data, ai chi ashundian mande. Sostar mai mangen te ashunen? Vi tume mangen te aven leske disipluria?"
John 9 28 Akushle les, ai phende leske, "Tu san disiplo; ame sam le disipluria le Mosesoske. 
John 9 29 Ame zhanas ke O Del dia duma le Mosesosa; numa kado, chi zhanas katar lo!"
John 9 30 O manush phendia lenge, "Shodo diela si! Ke chi zhanen katar lo, numa wo phuterdia murhe iakha! 
John 9 31 Ame zhanas ke O Del chi ashunel le bezexalen; numa ashunel le manushes kai chetil les ai kerel leski voia. 
John 9 32 De anda gor la lumiake shoxar chi ashundian ke vari kon phuterdia le iakha le korheske kana arakhadilo korho. 
John 9 33 Kodo manush te na avilino katar O Del, nashtisardino te kerel kanchi."
John 9 34 Ai won phende leske, "Tu arakhadilian antrego ando bezex, ai manges te sichares amen?" Ai dine les avri anda tampla.
John 9 35 O Jesus ashundia ke dine les avri, ai kana arakhlia les, phendia leske, "Pachas tu ando Shav le Manushesko?"
John 9 36 Wo phendia ka Jesus, "Phen mange, savo si, Gazda? Kaste te sai pachav ma ande leste!"
John 9 37 O Jesus phendia leske, "Dikhes les, wo si kai del duma tusa akana." 
John 9 38 Phendia leske, "Gazda, Pachav ma!" ai dia changa angla leste.
John 9 39 Porme O Jesus phendia, "Avilem ande kadia lumia te kerav e kris, kaste le korhe te sai dikhen; ai kodala kai dikhen te aven korhe.
John 9 40 Uni andal Farizeanuria kai sas lesa, ashunde kodala vorbi, ai phende leske, "Vi ame, sam korhe?"
John 9 41 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Te avilianas korhe, nas te aven doshale: numa akana tume phenen, "Ame dikhas," sa anda kodia tumare bezexa ashen.
John 10 1 "Phenav tumenge o chachimos, kodo kai chi del pa wudar ande shtala le bakriangi, numa kai anklel pa kaver rig, si ek chor ai nasul manush. 
John 10 2 Numa kodo kai avel pa wudar si o pastuxo le bakriango. 
John 10 3 Phutren o wudar angla leste, ai le bakria ashunen lesko glaso, ai akharel leske bakrorhen pa anaveste, ai ingerel le avri. 
John 10 4 Kana ankaladia avri sa peske bakrorhan, phirel angla lende, ai le bakriorha zhan pala leste, ke prinzharen lesko glaso. 
John 10 5 Chi zhana pala iek streino; numa nashena dur lestar, ke chi prinzharena o glaso le streinosko." 
John 10 6 O Jesus phendia lenge kadia paramichi, numa chi haliarde pa soste delas duma.
John 10 7 O Jesus mai phendia lenge, "Phenav tumenge o chachimos, me sim o wudar le bakriango. 
John 10 8 Sa le kaver kai avile mai anglal mandar si chor ai nasul manush, numa le bakrorha chi ashunde lenge. 
John 10 9 Me sim o wudar. Kon avela andre mandar, avela skepime; dela andre ai anklela avri, ai arakhela ek kimpo kai si char (arakhel xabe). 
John 10 10 O chor avel ferdi te chorel, te mudarel, ai te pharhavel; me avilem te avel le manushen o traio, ai te avel len but traio ando mishtimos.
John 10 11 "Me sim o lasho pastuxo. O lasho pastuxo del pesko traio pala peske bakriorha. 
John 10 12 O buchari (o manush pochindo) kai nai o pastuxo, ai nai leske le bakriorha, nashel kana dikhel ke avel o ruv, ai o ruv lel len ai rhespil len. 
John 10 13 Wo nashel ke si o buchari kai si pochindo, ai chi lel sama andal bakriorha.
John 10 14 Me sim o lasho pastuxo. Zhanav murhe bakrorhan, ai won zhanen man. 
John 10 15 Sar O Dat zhanel man, ai me zhanav le Dades. Me zhanav murhe bakriorhan ai won zhanen man; ai me dav murho traio pala murhe bakriorha. 
John 10 16 Mai si ma aver bakriorha, kai nai ande kadia shtala; trobul te anav vi len, te phiravav len te ashunen murho glaso; ai avena iek fialo bakriorha, ai iek pastuxosa. 
John 10 17 "O Dat drago mange ke dav murho traio, te lav les aver data palpale. 
John 10 18 Khonik chi lel murho traio mandar, numa dav les me mandar. Si ma e putiera te dav les, ai si ma e putiera te lav les palpale. Kadia si o zakono kai dia ma O Dat."
John 10 19 Anda kodia le Zhiduvuria chi haliarenas mashkar pende pala kadala vorbi, ke chi pachan iek fielo. 
John 10 20 But anda lende phenenas, si le iek beng ande leste! Dzilo lo! Sostar ashunen leste?"
John 10 21 Numa aver phenenas, "Iek manush kai si les beng ande leste nashti del duma kadia! Sar sai iek beng phutrel le iakha le korhenge?"
John 10 22 E vriama avili te keren O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ande Jerusalem; sas ivend. 
John 10 23 Ai O Jesus phiravelaspe ande tampla ando kalidori le Solomonosko. 
John 10 24 Le Zhiduvuria thodepe kolo lestar, ai phende leske, "Sode vriama zhi kana tu manges amen te zhanas? Phenes amenge o chachimos; "San tu O Kristo?"
John 10 25 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Mai phendem tumenge, numa chi pachan ma. Le buchia kai kerav ando o anav murho Dadesko, sikaven pa mande. 
John 10 26 Numa tume chi pachan, ke tume chi san anda murhe bakria, sar phendem tumenge. 
John 10 27 Murhe bakria ashunen murho glaso, ai zhanav le, ai aven pala mande. 
John 10 28 Ai dav le o traio le rhaiosko; ai chi xasavona shoxar, ai khonik chi lena le anda murho vas. 
John 10 29 Murho Dat kai dia le mange, wo mai baro lo savorhendar; ai khonik nashti lel le anda vas murhe Dadesko. 
John 10 30 Me ai O Dat sam iek.
John 10 31 Antunchi le Zhiduvuria mai line bax te shuden pe leste. 
John 10 32 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Sikadem tumenge but lashe buchia kai avile katar murho Dat; anda savi buchi tume mangen te shuden bax pe mande?"
John 10 33 Le Zhiduvuria phende, phenenas, "Nai anda ek lashi buchi ke mangas te shudas bax pe tute, numa ke rimos le Devles, ai tu san ek manush ai keres anda tute Del!"
John 10 34 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Si ramome ande tumaro zakono, Me phendem, 'Tume san dela?' 
John 10 35 Ai ame zhanas ke e vorba le Devleski si chachi sa data ai nashtil te thol la rigate; ai O Del akhardia le dela, kodolenge kai O Del dia peske vorba. 
John 10 36 Ai man, O Dat alosardia ma ai tradia ma ande lumia. Sar, antunchi, sai phenen "Tu tromas te les o than le Devlesko," ke phendem, "Me sim O Shav le Devlesko? 
John 10 37 Chi pachan ma, antunchi, te na kerava le buchia murhe Dadeske. 
John 10 38 Numa te kerava le, makar tume chi pachan ma, pachan ma pala murhe buchia kai kerav, kaste te sai zhanen, ai pachan, ke O Dat si ande mande, ai me sim ando Dat." 
John 10 39 Pe kadia mai zumade te len les; numa skepisailo anda lenge vas.
John 10 40 O Jesus mai gelo inchal o Jordan kotse kai o Iovano mai anglal ambolelas, ai beshlo kotse. 
John 10 41 But zhene avile leste ai phende, "O Iovano chi kerdia chi iek miraklo: numa so godi o Iovano phendia pa kado manush sas chacho." 
John 10 42 Ai but pachaiepe ande leste kotse.
John 11 1 Ek manush kai busholas Lazarus naswalosas. Beshlo ande foro kai busholas Bethany leske pheiasa, e Maria ai e Martha. 
John 11 2 Kodia Maria sas kai thodia pel punrhe le Devleske e duxi, ai koslia leske punrhe peske balensa, ai lako phral o Lazarus naswalo sas. 
John 11 3 Le dui pheia trade ieke manushes te phenen ka Jesus, "Devla, kodo kai si tuke drago si naswalo."
John 11 4 Kana O Jesus ashundia kodia, phendia, "Kodo naswalimos le Lazarusosko nai merimasko, numa te anel o luvudimos ka Del, ai vi O Shav le Devlesko avela luvudime." 
John 11 5 O Jesus drago sas leske e Martha, ai laki phei e Maria, ai o Lazarus. 
John 11 6 Kana O Jesus ashundia ke o Lazarus naswalo sas, mai beshlo dui dies ando than kai sas.
John 11 7 Pala kodia phendia peske disiplonge, "Aven palpale ande Judea."
John 11 8 Leske disipluria phende leske, "Gazda, de xantsi vriama palpale le Zhiduvuria mangenas te shuden bax pe tute; ai tu manges te zhas palpale kotse?"
John 11 9 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Nai desh u dui chasuria ando iek dies? Te si vari kon kai phirel adiese, chi perel, ke dikhel e vediara la lumiaki. 
John 11 10 Numa te si vari kon kai phirela e riate, perel, ke nai les vediara ande leste. 
John 11 11 Pala kodola vorbi, phendia lenge, "O Lazarus, amaro vortako sovel; numa zhav te wushtiavav les."
John 11 12 Antunchi leske disipluria phende, "Gazda, te sovela, sastiola." 
John 11 13 Numa O Jesus dia duma pa lesko merimos; numa won gindinas ke wo dia duma pa sovimos sar kana sovel.
John 11 14 Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge, "O Lazarus mulo. 
John 11 15 Ai pala tumende raduime sim ke chi simas lesa, ke kadia si te pachan tume; aven leste akana."
John 11 16 O Thomas phendia, kai sas akhardo Didimus, phendia le avre disiplonge, "Aven vi ame te meras lesa!"
John 11 17 Kana O Jesus areslo, ashundia ke o Lazarus sas de shtar dies ando greposhevo. 
John 11 18 Ai sar o Bethany nai dur katar o Jerusalem, pashe trin kilmeturia vai dui maili. 
John 11 19 But Zhiduvuria avile te dikhen e Martha, ai Maria, ke nekezhime kai mulo lengo phral. 
John 11 20 Kana e Martha ashundia ke O Jesus avelas, geli karing leste, numa e Maria beshli tele ando kher.
John 11 21 E Martha phendia ka Jesus, "Gazda, te avilianas katse, murho phral nas te avel mulo! 
John 11 22 Numa vi akana zhanav, ke so godi manges katar O Del, O Del del les tuke."
John 11 23 O Jesus phendia lake, "Cho phral zhuvindila."
John 11 24 E Martha phendia, "Zhanav ke wo zhuvindila kana savorhe wushtena paluno dies,"
John 11 25 O Jesus phendia lake, "Me sim o zhuvindimos ai o traio: Kon pachalape ande mande, traiila, marka te merela; 
John 11 26 Ai kon godi traiil ai pachalape ande mande shoxar chi merela. Pachas tu kadia?" Woi phenel leske,
John 11 27 "E, Gazda, pachav ma ke tu san O Kristo, O Shav le Devlesko, kai trobulas te avel ande lumia.
John 11 28 Kana phendia kadia. Martha gelitar te akharel chorial peska pheia e Maria, phenelas, "O Gazda katse lo ai akharel tu." 
John 11 29 Kana e Maria ashundia kadala vorbi, strazo wushtili, ai geli karing leste. 
John 11 30 Ke O Jesus chi areslo sas ando gav inker, numa kotse sas kai e Martha arakhlia les. 
John 11 31 Le Zhiduvuria kai sas ando kher la Mariasa te pochin la, dikhle ke strazo wushtili ai geli avri, gele pala late, phenenas; "Woi zhal ka greposhevo te rovel."
John 11 32 Kana e Maria aresli kai sas O Jesus. Ai dikhlia les, peli ka leske punrhe, ai phenel leske, "Gazda, te avilianas katse, murho phral nas te merel."
John 11 33 O Jesus dikhlia ke rovel, woi ai vi le Zhiduvuria kai avile lasa, nekezhisailo ando pesko duxo, ai sas leske mila. 
John 11 34 Ai wo phushlia len, "Kai groposardian les?" Won phende leske, "Gazda, aidi ai dikh."
John 11 35 O Jesus ruiia.
John 11 36 Pe kodia le Zhiduvuria phende, "Dikhen sar sas leske drago!" 
John 11 37 Ai uni anda lende phende, "Wo kai phuterdia le iakha le korheske, nashti kerdia vi kado manush te na merel?"
John 11 38 Mai iek data O Jesus nekezhisailo ande peste, ai gelo ka greposhevo. Sas iek podruma, ai ek bax thodino anglal. 
John 11 39 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Len o bax!" E Martha, e phei le muleski, phendia leske, "Gazda, vunzhe khandel; ke de shtar dies katse lo!"
John 11 40 O Jesus phendia lake, "Chi phendem tuke, ke te pachasa tu, dikhesa o barimos le Devlesko?"
John 11 41 Line o bax ai O Jesus vazdia le iakha opre, ai phendia, "Murho Dat, naisiv tuke ke kerdian so mangav. 
John 11 42 Me zhanav ke tu ashunes ma sagda; numa dem duma pala o narodo katse, kaste te pachanpe ke tu tradian ma."
John 11 43 Kana phendia kodia, tsipisardia ieke glaso zurales, "Lazarus, ankli avri!" 
John 11 44 Ai o mulo anklisto, le vas ai le punrhe phangle andel le derzi, ai lesko mui phanglo poxtan parno. O Jesus phendia lenge, "Phutren les, ai meken les te zhal."
John 11 45 But andel le Zhiduvuria avile karing e Maria ai dikhle so kerdia O Jesus, ai pachaiepe ande leste. 
John 11 46 Numa uni anda lende gele kal le Farizeanonge, ai phende lenge so kerdia O Jesus. 
John 11 47 Antunchi le Farizeanuria ai le bare rasha chidinisaile andek than, ai phende, "So te keras." Ke kado manush kerel but mirakluria! 
John 11 48 Te mekasa les te kerel, savorhe pachanpe ande leste; ai le Romanuria avena ai pharhaven amari tampla ai amaro them!"
John 11 49 Iek anda lende, kai busholas Caiaphas, kai sas o baro rashai kodo bersh, phendia lenge, "Tume chi zhanen kanchi! 
John 11 50 Tume chi haliaren ke mai mishto tumenge te avel iek manush te merel pala sa o narodo, de sar pala sa o them te avela pharhado?"
John 11 51 Wo chi phendia kodia anda peste; numa sar sas o baro rashai kodo bersh, profesisardia ke O Jesus trobul te merel pala o them le Zhidovongo. 
John 11 52 Ai na ferdi pala kado them, numa vi te chiden ande iek stato sa le shave le Devleske kai si pe swako rig. 
John 11 53 De katar kodo dies, phenenas mashkar pende sar te mudaren les.
John 11 54 Sa anda kodia O Jesus chi mai phiravelas anglal le Zhiduvuria, numa gelotar karing iek rik kai si e pusta, ande ek gav kai busholas Ephraim, kai beshlo peske disiplonsa.
John 11 55 Ai O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo pashiol; ai but manush andai them avenas ando o Jerusalem mai anglal sar o dies o baro, te vuzharenpe anda penge bezexa. 
John 11 56 Won rodenas le Jesusos, kana chidenape ande tampla, ai phenenas iek kavreske, "So gindin? Chi avela po dies o baro?" 
John 11 57 Le bare rasha ai le Farizeanuria dine iek ordina, "Ke te si vari kon kai zhanena kai lo O Jesus, trobul te phenel les, ke trobul te astarel les."
John 12 1 Shov dies mai anglal O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, O Jesus areslo ande Bethany, kai beshlo o Lazarus, kai O Jesus zhuvindisardia les anda le mule. 
John 12 2 Kotse dine les te xan; e Martha podailas les; numa Lazarus sas iek anda kodala kai sas lesa ka e skafidi. 
John 12 3 E Maria lia dopash litre pherdi duxi kai si kuchi, thodia la pe le punrhe le Jesusoske, ai woi koslia leske punrhe peska balensa. Ai sa o kher pherdilo sunga katar e duxi.
John 12 4 Iek anda leske disiplonge, o Judas Iscariot  kodo kai trobul te purhil les, phendia, 
John 12 5 "Sostar chi bichindian kadia duxi trin shela teliara, ai le love dine kal chorhe?" 
John 12 6 Wo phendia kadia lenge, na ke sas leske mila anda le chorhe, numa ke sas chor, ai sas les o gono, ai lelas so sas andre ando gono.
John 12 7 Numa O Jesus phendia lenge, "Mek la! Woi garadiasas kadia duxi pala e vriama kana groposarena ma. 
John 12 8 Ke le chorhe sagda avena tumensa, numa me chi avava tumensa sagda."
John 12 9 But narodo anda le Zhiduvuria ashunde ke O Jesus sas ande Bethany, ai avenas na ferdi pala O Jesus, numa vi te dikhen o Lazarus, kai O Jesus zhuvindisailo anda le mule. 
John 12 10 Le bare rasha dine pe duma te mudaren vi le Lazarusos, 
John 12 11 ke but Zhiduvuria geletar lendar pala leste, ai pachanaspe ando Jesus.
John 12 12 Terharin but narodo avile ka O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, kana ashunde ke O Jesus zhal ando Jerusalem. 
John 12 13 Line patria katar le krenzhi, ai gele angla leste, ai tsipinas, "Hosana! Raduime O Amperato le Zhidovongo kai avel ando anav le Devlesko!" 
John 12 14 O Jesus arakhlia iek magari ai beshlo pe leste, sar sas ramome, 
John 12 15 "Na dara, tu foro anda Zion! Dikh! Cho Amperato avel, beshel pe iek terno magari."
John 12 16 Leske disipluria chi haliarde mai anglal kadala dieli; numa kana O Jesus lia pesko barimos, denas pe goji ke sas ramome pa leste, ai kerdilo sa so trobul te kerdiol.
John 12 17 Sa kodala kai sas lesa kana akhardia o Lazarus anda o greposhevo, ai wushtiardia les anda le mule, phende so dikhle ai so kerdia. 
John 12 18 Ai o narodo avel angla leste, ke ashunde ke kerdia kodo miraklo. 
John 12 19 Le Farizeanuria phenenas iek kavreske, "Tume dikhen, ke chi nirin kanchi! Dikh! Sa e lumia geli pala leste!"
John 12 20 Uni Grekuria anda kodala kai gele ando Jerusalem te rhugin po Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo: 
John 12 21 Won avile ka Filip, wo sas anda Bethsaida ande Galilee, ai phende. "Raia, ame mangas te dikhas O Jesus." 
John 12 22 O Philip gelo ai phendia o Andre, antunchi o Andre ai o Philip gele ai phende ka O Jesus.
John 12 23 O Jesus phendia lenge, "O chaso avilo kai O Shav le Manushesko trobul te luvudinles. 
John 12 24 Phenav tumenge o chachimos: te na merela e sumuntsa kai peli ande e phuv ashel korkorho; numa te merela, dela but fruti. 
John 12 25 Savo kai si leske drago kado traio xasarela les; ai kodo kai gretsol kado traio ande kadia lumia garavel les te zhal ando traio le rhaiosko. 
John 12 26 Te si vari kon kai podail ma, mek te lelpe pala mande; ai kotse kai avava me, kotse avela vi murhi sluga; kodo kai podaila ma, murho Dat luvudila les.
John 12 27 "Akana murho duxo si buntuime. Ai so sai phenav? "Murho Dat, le ma anda kado chaso?" Numa pala kodia avilem zhi ka kado chaso. 
John 12 28 "Murho Dat, luvudisar chiro anav!" Ai iek glaso dia duma anda o rhaio, phenelas, "Bariardem les, ai mai luvudiva les." 
John 12 29 O narodo kai sas kotse, ashunde o glaso, ai uni phenenas, "Iek rhonjito si!" Aver phenenas, "Iek angelo dia lesa duma!"
John 12 30 Numa O Jesus phendia lenge, "Na ke pala mande kado glaso ashundilo, numa pala tumende. 
John 12 31 Akana avili e kris la lumiaki; akana o beng kai si ande lumia avela shudino avri. 
John 12 32 Ai me, kana avava vazdino opre katar e phuv, tsirdava sa le manushen mande." 
John 12 33 Sar del duma kadia, sikavelas lenge sar si te merel.
John 12 34 Le manush phende leske, "Ashundian andai klishka le zakonoske ke O Kristo beshela sa data." Sar sai phenes, "O Shav le Manushesko trobul te avel vazdino? Kon si kodo Shav le Manushesko?"
John 12 35 O Jesus phendia lenge, "E vediara si tumensa mai xantsi vriama. Phiren zhi kai si tumen e vediara, kashte te na avela o tuniariko pe tumende, ke kodo kai phirel ando tuniariko chi zhanel kai zhal. 
John 12 36 Zhi kai si tume e vediara, pachan tume ande vediara, kashte te aven shave la vediarake." O Jesus phendia kadala dieli, gelotar, ai garadilo dur lendar.
John 12 37 Marka ke kerdia but mirakluria angla lende, chi pachanaspe ande leste, 
John 12 38 Eta, te pherdiol e vorba le profetoski o Isaiah, kai phendiasas, "Devla, kon pachaiape ande so phendem? Ai kaske O Kristo sikadia peski putiera?"
John 12 39 Anda kodia won nashti pachanaspe, ke o Isaiah mai phendia,
John 12 40 "Korhandia lenge iakha, ai zulardia lenge ilo; te na dikhen penge iakhensa, ai te na haliaren penge ilesa, ai chi aven mande te aven skepime, ai te na sastiarav le." 
John 12 41 Isaiah phendia kadala dieli, kana dikhlia lesko barimos, ai dia duma pa leste. 
John 12 42 Numa vi anda le bare le Zhidovongo pachaiepe ande leste; numa angla le Farizeanuria, chi sikavenas ke pachanpe, daratar ke den len avri anda e synagogue. 
John 12 43 Ke mai drago lenge o chetaimos le manushenge de sar o luvudimos katar O Del.
John 12 44 O Jesus dia duma ando baro glaso, "Kodo kai pachal ande mande, pachalpe na ande mande ferdi, numa ande kodo kai tradia ma. 
John 12 45 Ai kodo dikhel ma, dikhel kodales kai tradia ma. 
John 12 46 Avilem ande lumia sar iek vediara, kashte kon godi pachalape ande mande te na beshel ando tuniariko.
John 12 47 Te si vari kon kai ashunel murhe vorbi, numa chi pachal le, chi krisiniv les, ke me chi avilem te krisiniv e lumia, numa te skepiv la lumia. 
John 12 48 Kodo kai shudel ma, ai kai chi premil murhe vorbi si les iek kai krisinila les. E vorba kai phendem, woi dela les pe kris po paluno dies! 
John 12 49 Ke chi den duma anda mande; numa O Dat kai tradia ma, phendia mange so trobul te phenav. 
John 12 50 Ai zhanav ke anda leske vorbi si o traio le rhaiosko. Sa anda kodia le dieli kai phenav, phenav le sar O Dat phendia le mange."
John 13 1 Akana sa o dies mai anglal O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, O Jesus zhanelas ke lesko chaso avilo te mukhel kadia lumia ai te zhal kai Dat. De zurales sas leske drago leske manush kai sas ande kadia lumia, ai sas leske drago leske manush zhando gor.
John 13 2 O Jesus ai leske disipluria xanas, o beng vunzhe thodiasas ando ilo le Judasosko Iscariot, o shav le Simonosko, te purhil les 
John 13 3 O Jesus zhanelas ke O Dat diasas swako diela ande leske vas, ke avilo katar O Del, ai zhalatar ka Del. 
John 13 4 Wushtilo katar e skafidi, ai shudia peske tsalia pa peste, ai lia iek pishtiri ai phandiolas pe lasa. 
John 13 5 Pala kadia shordia pai ande iek balai, ai thodiape te xalavel le punrhe le disiplonge, ai te kosel le la pishtiriasa kai phandiolas pe lasa.
John 13 6 Ai avilo ka Simon Petri, ai o Petri phendia leske, "Devla, tu xalaves murhe punrhe?"
John 13 7 O Jesus phendia leske, "So kerav chi haliares akana, numa haliaresa mai angle."
John 13 8 O Petri phendia leske, "Na chi iek data chi xalavesa murhe punrhe!" O Jesus phendia leske, "Te na xalavav che punrhe tu chi mai avesa murho disiplo."
John 13 9 O Simon Petri phendia leske, "Devla, na ferdi murhe punrhe! Numa vi murhe vas ai vi murho shero!" 
John 13 10 O Jesus phendia leske, "Kodo kai si xalado mai trobul ferdi te xalavel peske punrhe, te avel antrego vuzho; ai tume vuzhe, numa na savorhe." 
John 13 11 Ke zhanelas savo si te purhila les, sa anda kodia phendia, "Chi san savorhe vuzhe."
John 13 12 Pala kadia kana xaladia lenge punrhe, ai lia pe peste peske tsalia thodiape kai skafidi, ai phendia lenge, "Haliardian so me kerdem tumenge?" 
John 13 13 "Tume akharen ma o Gazda ai Devla; ai vorta phenen; ke sim. 
John 13 14 Te xaladem tumare punrhe, tumaro Devla ai tumaro Gazda; vi tume trobul te xalaven tumare punrhe iek kavreske. 
John 13 15 Ke sikadem tumenge sar te keren, kaste te keren sar me kerdem tumenge. 
John 13 16 Chachimasa, chachimasa, phenav tumenge, e sluga nai mai bari sar pesko Gazda; chi o manush kai si tradino nai mai baro katar kodo kai tradia les. 
John 13 17 Te zhanena kadala dieli, tume san raduime ferdi te thona tume te keren le!
John 13 18 "Chi phenav, ke dav duma pa savorhende; zhanav save alosardem; numa trobul o ramomos te kerdiol, so phenel, "Kodo kai xal manrho mansa vazdia peske kur pe mande. 
John 13 19 Akana phenav tumenge mai anglal sar te kerdiol, kashte kana kerdiola, tume sai pachan ke sim me wo. 
John 13 20 Chachimasa, chachimasa, phenav tumenge, kodo kai premila kodoles kai me tradem, premil man; ai kodo kai premil man, premil kodoles kai tradia man."
John 13 21 Kana O Jesus phendia kadia, sas buntuime ande pesko duxo, ai phendia, "Magdata, chachimasa, chachimasa phenav tumenge, 'Iek anda tumende purhila ma.'"
John 13 22 Le disipluria dikhenas pe iek kavreste, chi zhanenas pa kaste del duma. 
John 13 23 Iek anda leske disipluria, kodo kai O Jesus sas leske drago, beshelas pasha Jesus. 
John 13 24 O Simon Petri kerel leske semno, te phushel savo si kado kai O Jesus phenel pa leste.
John 13 25 Ai kodia disiplo bandilo po kolin le Jesusosko, ai phendia leske, "Gazda, kon si kodo?"
John 13 26 O Jesus phendia leske, "Kodo si kai dava les o kotor manrho pala te thav les ando tiari." Antunchi thodia o manrho ando tiari, ai dia les ka Judas Iscariot, o shav le Simonosko. 
John 13 27 Ai sar o kotor manrho sas dino o beng dia ande leste. O Jesus phendia leske, "So si tu te keres, keres les sigo." 
John 13 28 Numa chi iek anda kodola kai sas kai skafidi chi haliarde sostar phenelas leske kadia. 
John 13 29 Ke uni anda lende gindinas, ke o Judas sas leste gonorho le lovenge, ai O Jesus phendia leske, "Chin amenge so trobul ame kana avela O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo; vai te del vari so le chorhenge. 
John 13 30 O Judas lia o kotor manrho, ai grebisailo te anklel avri; ai vunzhe e riat sas.
John 13 31 Kana o Judas anklisto avri, O Jesus phendia, "Akana O Shav le Manushesko sas luvudime, ai O Del sas luvudime ande leste." 
John 13 32 Te sas O Del luvudime ande leste, O Del vi wo luvudila les ande peste, ai luvudila les mai sigo.
John 13 33 Murhe tsinorhe shave, me sim tumensa pe xantsi vriama. Tume rodena ma; ai sar phendem le Zhidovonge, tume nashtin te aven kai me zhav.
John 13 34 Phenav tumenge magdata akana, dav tumen iek nevo zakono, aven drago iek kavreske; sar sanas mange drago, vi tume aven drago iek kavreske. 
John 13 35 Pala kodo savorhe zhanena ke tume san murhe disipluria, te avena drago iek kavreske.
John 13 36 O Simon Petri phendia leske, "Devla, kai zhas tu?" Jesus phendia leske, "Nashtis akana te aves pala mande kai zhav; numa avesa pala mande mai palal."
John 13 37 O Petri phendia leske, "Devla, Sostar nashtiv te zhav pala tute akana? Ke me dav murho traio pala tute."
John 13 38 O Jesus phendia leske, "De sa cho traio pala mande: Chachimasa, chachimasa, phenav tuke, mai anglal sar te bashel o kurkorsho, tu phenesa trivar ke chi zhanes ma."
John 14 1 Na meken te nekezhilpe tumaro ilo: pachan tume ando Del, ai vi pachan tume ande mande. 
John 14 2 Si but sobi ando kher murhe Dadesko, te na avilino, me sas te phenav tumenge. Me zhav te lasharav tumenge iek than. 
John 14 3 Ai kana zhavatar ai lasharava tumenge iek than, avava palpale ai lava tume mande, saxke avava, vi tume aven. 
John 14 4 Tume zhanen kai zhav, ai zhanen vi o drom.
John 14 5 O Thomas phendia leske, "Devla, ame chi zhanas kai tu zhas. Sar sai zhanas o drom?"
John 14 6 O Jesus phendia leske, "Me sim o drom, o chachimos, ai o traio. Khonik nashti avel ka Dat, de ferdi te nakhela mandar. 
John 14 7 Tume te zhanglianas man, zhanglianas vi murhe Dades; numa akana zhanen les, ai vi dikhlian les.
John 14 8 O Filip phendia leske, "Devla, sikav amenge le Dades, ai dosta avela amenge."
John 14 9 O Jesus phendia leske, "Pala sa kadia vriama sim tumensa ai inker chi zhanes ma, kodo kai dikhlia man dikhlia vi le Dades; sar sai mothos tu, 'Sikav amenge le Dades?' 
John 14 10 Tu chi pachas ke me sim ando Dat, ai ke O Dat si ande mande? Le vorbi kai mothav tumenge chi mothav le anda mande: numa O Dat kai traiil ande mande, wo si kai kerel e buchi.
John 14 11 Pachan ma kai me sim ando Dat, ai O Dat si ande mande: vai pachan ma pala le buchia kai kerav. 
John 14 12 Chachimasa, chachimasa, me phenav tmenge, kodo kai pachalpe ande mande, kerela vi wo le buchia kai kerav; ai inker kerela vi mai bare; ke me zhavtar ka Dat.
John 14 13 Ai so godi tume mangena ande murho anav, me kerava, saxke te avel O Dat luvudime ando Shav. 
John 14 14 Te mangena tume vari so ande murho anav, me kerava.
John 14 15 "Te sim tumenge drago, garaven murho zakono. 
John 14 16 Ai me rhugiva ma ka Dat, ai wo dela tumen aver Zhutitori, saxke te beshel sagda tumensa. 
John 14 17 O Swunto Duxo le chachimasko, kai e lumia nashti premil, ke chi dikhel les, ai chi zhanel les: numa tume zhanen les; ke wo traiil tumensa, ai avela ande tumende. 
John 14 18 "Me chi mekava tume sirotki: avava tumende. 
John 14 19 Mai xantsi vriama, ai lumia chi mai dikhela ma; numa tume dikhena ma: ke me traiiv, vi tume traiina. 
John 14 20 Kado dies tume zhanena ke me sim ando murho Dat, ai tume san ande mande, ai me sim ande tumende. 
John 14 21 Kodo kai si les murhe zakonuria, ai kai garavel len, kodo si kai leske drago mange; ai kodo kai leske drago mange, murho Dat avela leske drago leske, ai te avela mange drago leske ai sikavava ma leste."
John 14 22 O Judas, na o Iscariot phendia leske. "Devla sar ta trobul ferdi te sikadios amenge ai na la lumiake?"
John 14 23 O Jesus phendia leske, "Te sim vari kaske drago, wo garavela murhe vorbi: ai murho Dat drago leske, ame avasa leste, ai traiis lesa. 
John 14 24 Kodo kai leske drago mange chi garavel vov si murhe vorbi, ai e vorba kai tume ashunen nai mandar, numa katar O Dat kai tradia ma.
John 14 25 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli zhi kai sim tumensa, 
John 14 26 numa O Zhutitori, kai si O Swunto Duxo, kai O Dat tradela ande murho anav, sicharela tume swako fielo, ai serela tume so godi phendem tumenge.
John 14 27 Me mekav tumenge e pacha, Me dav tume murhi pacha, Me chi dav la tumenge sar del la tumenge e lumia, na meken te nekezhil pe tumaro ilo, ai te na daral.
John 14 28 Tume ashundian ke phendem tmenge, Me zhavtar, ai pale avav tumen, te sanas tume drago mange, tume raduisailianas, ke phendem. Zhav ka Dat, ke murho Dat mai baro lo mandar. 
John 14 29 Ai akana phendem tumenge kadala dieli mai anglal sar te kerdion; saxke kana kerdiona te pachan tume. 
John 14 30 Chi mai dava duma tumensa, ke o baro la lumiako avel, wo nai les chi iek putiera pe mande. 
John 14 31 Numa saxke te zhanel e lumia ke mange drago le Dades; ai ke kerav palai ordina kai dia ma O Dat. 'Wushten opre, ai aventar katsar.'"
John 15 1 "Me sim o chacho khash le strugurosko, ai murho Dat si kodo kai lel sama katar e rez. 
John 15 2 Ai swako krenga kai si ande mande kai chi anel fruta, wo shinel la; numa swako krenga kai anel fruta; wo shinel la, saxke te avel la mai but fruta. 
John 15 3 Akana te san vuzho/vuzhi palai vorba kai phendem tute. 
John 15 4 Beshes ande mande, ai me beshava ande tute, sar e krenzha kai nashtil anda peste te avel la fruta, te na beshela phangli ka khash; kadia tu nashtis te na beshesa ande mande.
John 15 5 Me sim o khash le strugurosko, ai tume san le krenzhi. Kuko kai beshel ande mande, ai me beshav ande leste, wo anel but fruta; ke tu bi mango nashtis te keres khanchi. 
John 15 6 Te si vari kon kai chi beshel ande mande, wo shudino lo avri sar e krenzha, ai shuchol; ai porme chiden le, ai shuden le ande iag, kai phabosarde. 
John 15 7 Te beshena ande mande , ai murhe vorbi te beshena ande tuende, phushen so tume mange, ai avela tume dino so mangen.  
John 15 8 Kana tume den but fruta, murho Dat si luvudime; kadia sikavel kai san murhe disipluria.
John 15 9 Sar O Dat drago mange, mange drago sas tumen; beshen ande murhe dragostia. 
John 15 10 Te garavena murhe zakonuria, tume beshena ande murhe dragostia; sa sar garadem me le zakonuria murhe Dadeske, ai ke beshav ando leski dragostia. 
John 15 11 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli, saxke te avel murho raduimos ande tumende, ai tumaro raduimos te avel pherdo. 
John 15 12 Eta, murho zakono, aven drazhi iek kavreske, sar sas mange drazhi tumenge. Nai mai bari dragostia de sar te des pesko traio leske vortachenge. 
John 15 13 Tume san murhe vortacha, te kerena so phenav tumenge.
John 15 14 Chi mai akharav tumen slugi; ke e sluga chi zhanel so kerel lako gazda: numa akhardem tume vortacha; ke phendem tumenge swako fielo sa so godi kai ashundem katar murho Dat. 
John 15 15 Tume chi alosardian ma, numa me alosardem tumen, ai phendem tumenge te zhan ai te avel tume fruta, ai tumare fruta te avel fruta kai inkerel: saxke so tume mangena katar O Dat ande murho anav, wo dela tume. 
John 15 16 So mangav me tumendar, si te aven drazhi iek kavreske.
John 15 17 Te e lumia gretsol tume, tume zhanen ke e lumia gretsosardia ma mai anglal tumendar. 
John 15 18 Te avilianas andai lumia, e lumia sas te avel lake drago so si lako; numa ke chi san andai lumia, ai ke alosardem tume andai lumia, anda kadia e lumia gretsol tume. 
John 15 19 Dem tume goji kai vorba kai phendem tumenge. 'E sluga nai mai bari katar pesko gazda.' Te chinuisarde man, chinuina vi tumen; te garade murhi vorba, garavena vi tumari. 
John 15 20 Numa won kerena tumenge sa kadala dieli pala murho anav, ke chi zhanen kodoles kai tradia ma. 
John 15 21 Te na avilemas ai te na demas lensa duma, nas te aven doshale ke kerde bezexa: numa akana nashtin motson ke nai doshale anda penge bezexa. 
John 15 22 Kodoleske kai gretsol man, gretsol vi murho Dat. 
John 15 23 Te na kerdemas mashkar lende bucha kai khonik aver chi kerdia, nas te avel le bezexa: Numa akana won dikhlesas so kerdem, ai won gretson ma ai murho Dat. 
John 15 24 Numa kadala dieli kerdile, saxke te kerdiol e vorba kai si ramome ande lengo zakono, 'Won gretsosarde ma intaino.'
John 15 25 Kana avela O Zhutitori, kodo kai tradava tumenge katar le Dadesko, ai vi O Swunto Duxo le chachimasko avel katar O Dat, wo mothola pa mande. 
John 15 26 Ai vi tume mothona pa mande, ke tume san mansa de anda gor.
John 16 1 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli, saxke te na rimon tume. 
John 16 2 Won shudena tume avri andal Synagoguria: ai vi avela e vriama, kai kon godi mudarela tume gindila ke kerel vorta angla Del. 
John 16 3 Ai won kerena kadia, ke chi zhangle chi le Dades, ai chi man. 
John 16 4 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli, saxke kana avela e vriama, tume serenape kai phendem tumenge. Me chi phendem tumenge pa kadala dieli de anda gor, ke me simas tumensa.
John 16 5 Numa akana zhavtar karing kodo kai tradia ma; ai chi iek anda tumende chi phushel ma, "Kai zhas?" 
John 16 6 Numa ke phendem tumenge kadale dieli, tumaro ilo nekezhisailo.
John 16 7 Numa phenav tumenge o chachimos: mai mishto avela tumenge te zhavtar: ke te na zhavatar, O Zhutitori chi avela tumende; numa te zhavatar, tradava les tumende. 
John 16 8 Ai kana avela, sikavela le narodoske ke shubinpe pa bezex, pa so si vorta, ai pai kris le Devleski. 
John 16 9 Won shubinpe pa bezex, ke chi pachanpe ande mande; 
John 16 10 pa so si vorta, ke me zhav ka murho Dat, ai ke chi mai dikhena ma; 
John 16 11 pai kris, ke o baro kadala lumiako dino lo pe kris.
John 16 12 Mai si ma inker but dieli te phenav tumenge, numa nashtin te haliaren le akana. 
John 16 13 Kana O Swunto Duxo le chachimosko avela, wo ingerela tume ande sa o chachimos: ke wo chi dela duma pa peste; numa phenela so godi ashunel: ai phenela tumenge le dieli kai avena. 
John 16 14 Wo luvudila man: ke lela so si murho, ai phenela tumenge. 
John 16 15 So godi kai si O Dat, murho si: anda kodia phendem, "Te lel so si murho, ai te phenela tumenge."
John 16 16 "Mai xantsi vriama, ai chi mai dikhena ma; ai porme mai xantsi vriama, ai dikhena ma, ke me zhav ka Dat."
John 16 17 Pe kado divano uni anda leske disiplonge denas pe duma won de won. Ai mothonas, "So znachil so phenel amenge, mai xantsi vriama, ai chi mai dikhena ma, ai porme mai xantsi vriama, ai dikhena ma, ke me zhav ka Dat?" 
John 16 18 No won phende "So znachil so phenel, mai xantsi vriama? Ame chi zhanas pa soste del duma."
John 16 19 O Jesus zhanelas ke mangenas te phushen lestar, ai phendia lenge, "Tume phushen iek kavrestar so phendem. "Mai xantsi vriama ai chi mai dikhena ma, ai porme mai xantsi vriama, ai dikhena ma?" 
John 16 20 Chachimasa, chachimasa, me phenav tumenge, tume rovena ai suspinina ai le lumia raduilape; tume avena nekezhime, numa tumaro nekazo parhudiola ai avela raduimos. 
John 16 21 E zhuvli kana si te avel la glata nekezhime la, ke lako chaso avilo: numa kana o tsinorho arakhadilo, chi mai serelpe ka chino, pala raduimos kai si la, ke iek manush kerdilo ande lumia. 
John 16 22 No vi tume akana san nekeshime: numa mai dikhava tume, ai tumaro ilo raduilape, ai khonik chi lela tumendar tumaro raduimos. 
John 16 23 Kana avela kodo dies tume chi mai phushena mandar khanchi. Chachimasa, chachimasa, me phenav tumenge, so tume mangena katar O Dat ande murho anav, wo dela tumen. 
John 16 24 Zhi akana tume chi manglian khanchi ande murho anav: mangen, ai avela tumen dino; saxke te pherdiol tumaro raduimos.
John 16 25 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli andel paramicha: numa e vriama avela, kana chi mai dava tumensa duma andel paramichi, numa dava tumensa duma vorta pa Dat. 
John 16 26 Kana kodia dies avela tume mangena ande murho anav: ai chi phenav tumenge, ke rhugiva ma ka Dat anda tumende: 
John 16 27 Ke O Dat leske drago tumenge, ke sanas tume drazhi mange, ai tume pachaian tume ke me avilem katar Del. 
John 16 28 "Me avilem katar O Dat, ai avilem ande lumia: numa akana zhavtar andai lumia, ai zhav ka Dat."
John 16 29 Leske disipluria phende leske, "Eta tu des duma akana vorta, ai chi des duma andel paramichia. 
John 16 30 Akana zhanas ke tu zhanes swako fielo, ai ke chi trobul vari kon te phushel tu vari so: anda kodia ame pachas ame ke tu avilian katar O Del."
John 16 31 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Tume pachan akana? 
John 16 32 Eta, e vriama avela, ai vunzhe avili, kai avela swako ande tumende respiime, pe peski rik, ai mekena ma korkorho; numa chi sim korkorho, ke O Dat si mansa.
John 16 33 Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli, saxke te avel tume e pacha ande mande. Tume avena zumade ande lumia: numa na daran; ke me nirisardem pe lumia!"
John 17 1 Pala kodia kana dine duma O Jesus, vazdia le iakha po cheri, ai phendia, "Murho Dat, e vriama avili; 
John 17 2 luvudisar che Shaves, saxke cho Shav te luvudil tut: ke dian les e putiera pe sa le manush, te del o traio le rhaiosko ka sa kodola ka dian les. 
John 17 3 Ai o traio le rhaiosko si te zhanen tu tut ferdi o chacho Del, ai O Jesus Kristo, kodoles kai tradian. 
John 17 4 Me luvudisardem tu pe phuv: me kerdem e buchi kai dian ma te kerav. 
John 17 5 Ai akana, murho Dat, luvudisar ma pasha tute, sakadia luvudimos kai sas ma pasha tute ma anglal e lumia kerdilisas.
John 17 6 Kerdem te zhangliolpe cho anav kal manush kai dian ma mashkar e lumia: Won sas chire, ai tu dian le mange; ai won garade chi vorba. 
John 17 7 Akana won zhanen ke so godi dian ma tutar avel. 
John 17 8 Ke me dem le le vorbi kai dian ma; ai won premisarde le, ai won chaches zhanen ke me avilem tutar, ai won pachaie ke tu tradian ma. 
John 17 9 Me rhugiv ma lenge: chi rhugiv ma anda lumia, numa kodolenge kai dian ma; ke won chire si. 
John 17 10 Ai so godi si murho chiro si, ai so si chiro murho si; ai me sim luvudime ande lende. 
John 17 11 Me chi mai sim ande lumia, numa won si ande lumia, ai me avav tute. Murho Swunto Dat, garav le ande cho anav kai dian ma, saxke te aven iek, sar sam ame. 
John 17 12 Kana me simas lensa ande lumia, me garadem le ande chiro anav; ai me garadem kodolen kai dian ma, ai chi iek anda lende chi xasailo, numa ferdi o shav le xasarimasko; saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski.
John 17 13 Ai akana me avav tute; ai phenav kadala dieli ande lumia, saxke te pherdiol ande lende murho raduimos. 
John 17 14 Me dem len chi vorba; ai e lumia gretsosardia le, ke won nai andai lumia, sar me chi sim andai lumia. 
John 17 15 Me chi rhugiv ma te les le andai lumia, numa me mangav tu te arakhes le katar o nasulimos. 
John 17 16 Won nai andai lumia, sar me chi sim andai lumia. 
John 17 17 Vuzhar le che chachimasa, che vorba si o chachimos. 
John 17 18 Sar tu tradian ma ande lumia, i me tradem le ande lumia. 
John 17 19 Ai me korkorho vuzharav man lenge, saxke vi won te aven vuzharde katar o chachimos.
John 17 20 Chi rhugiv ma ferdi anda lende, numa vi kodolenge kai pachanaspe ande mande katar penge vorba. 
John 17 21 Saxke savorhe te aven iek; sar tu, murho Dat, san ande mande, ai me sim ande tute, saxke vi won te aven iek ande amende: te pachalpe e lumia kai tu tradian ma. 
John 17 22 Me dem le o luvudimos kai dian ma, saxke te aven vi won iek, sar ame sam iek: 
John 17 23 Me ande lende, ai tu ande mande, saxke te aven vorta ande iek; ai e lumia te zhanel ke tu tradian ma, ai ke sas tumenge drazhi mange, sar simas drago tuke.
John 17 24 "Murho Dat, mangav kodolen kai dian ma te aven vi won mansa kai sim; saxke te dikhen murho luvudimos, o luvudimos kai dian ma; ke sanas tuke drago mange mai anglal kerdili sas e lumia.
John 17 25 Murho Dat o chacho, e lumia chi zhanglia tu: numa me zhanglem tu, ai kodola zhangle ke tu tradian ma. 
John 17 26 Me kerdem len te zhanen chiro anav, ai mai kerava len te zhanen tu: saxke e dragostia kai si tu mange te avel ande lende, ai vi me te avav ande lende."
John 18 1 Kana O Jesus phendiasas kadala vorbi, gelo peske disiplonsa inchal o pai kai bushol Cedron, kotse sas iek sado, ai wo gelo andre peske disiplonsa. 
John 18 2 Ai vi o Judas, kai purhisardia les, zhanelas kodo tsan; ke O Jesus ai leske disipluria butivar chidepe kotse andek than. 
John 18 3 O Judas gelo ka sado, ai andia pesa ketanen ai le zhandari kai sas tradine katar le bare le rashange ai katar le Farizeanuria; won avenas le sabiensa, ai le lamponsa, ai le khashtensa kai phabonas.
John 18 4 O Jesus zhanelas so si te kerdiol pe lesa, gelo karing lende, ai phendia lenge, "Kas roden?" Le ketani phende leske,
John 18 5 "O Jesus andai Nazareth." O Jesus phendia lenge, "Me sim." Ai o Judas, kai purhisardia les, lensa sas. 
John 18 6 Kana O Jesus phendia lenge, "Me sim," won dinepe palpale, ai pele tele.
John 18 7 O Jesus mai phushlia le, "Kas roden?" Ai won phende, "O Jesus andai Nazareth."
John 18 8 O Jesus phendia, "Me phendem tumenge ke me sim: No te sim me kai roden, meken kodolen te zhantar. 
John 18 9 Wo phendia kadia saxke te kerdiolpe e vorba, kai phendiasas. Chi xasardem chi iek anda kodola kai dian ma.
John 18 10 O Simon Petri kai sas les iek sabia lia la, ai dia iek le bare rashaska sluga, ai shindia lako khan o chacho. Kodia sluga busholas Malchus. 
John 18 11 O Jesus phendia le Petreske, "Tho palpale chi sabia, so te na piiav e kuchi kai murho Dat dia ma te piiav?"
John 18 12 Antunchi le ketani lenge bare ai zhandari le Zhidovonge line le Jesusos, ai phangle les. 
John 18 13 Ingerde les mai anglal kai Annas; ke sas o sokro le Caiaphasosko, kai sas baro rashai kodo bersh. 
John 18 14 Ai o Caiaphas sas kodo kai phendiasas le Zhidovonge, "Mai mishto te merel iek manush le narodoske."
John 18 15 O Simon Petri ai aver disiplo lenaspe pala Jesus, kodia disiplo zhanelas les o baro rashai, ai gelo vi wo le Jesusosa ande bar le baro rashasko. 
John 18 16 Numa o Petri beshlo avri pasha wudar, o kolaver disiplo kai zhanelas les o baro rashai, anklisto avri ai dia duma la zhuvliasa kai arakhelas o wudar, ai angerdia o Petri andre.
John 18 17 Antunchi e sluga kai garavelas o wudar phendia le Petreske, pate chi san vi tu iek disiplo kadale manushesko? Ai wo phendia "Nichi, chi sim."
John 18 18 Ai le slugi ai zhandari beshenas anda punrhende kotse, kai kerde iag le angaresa, ke shil sas: Ai tachonas, vi o Petri sas lensa, ai tacholas vi wo.
John 18 19 O baro rashai phushelas le Jesusos pa leske disipluria, ai pa lesko sicharimos.
John 18 20 O Jesus phendia leske, "Me dem duma angla savorhende le narodosa; me sichardem sagda ande synagogue, ai ando tampla, kai sa le Zhiduvuria chidenaspe; ai me chi phendem khanchi chordanes. 
John 18 21 Sostar tu phushes mandar? Phush kodolendar kai ashunde man, so phendem lenge: Ashun! Won zhanen so phendem."
John 18 22 Pe kodo divano, iek andal zhandari kai sas kotse dia iek palma le Jesusos, ai phendia, "Kadia si sar des duma kal bare rashas?"
John 18 23 O Jesus phendia leske, "Te si ke dem duma nasul, phen mange che nasulimos phendem: ai te dem duma mishto, sostar des ma iek palma?" 
John 18 24 Annas tradia les phanglo ka Caiaphas o baro rashai.
John 18 25 O Simon Petri kotse sas ai tacholas. Ai won phende leske, "Pate tu chi san anda kodola disipluria?" Ai wo phendia, "Nichi, me chi sim anda kodola."
John 18 26 Iek sluga le bare rashaski sas ek niamo kodolesa kai o Petri shindiasas lesko khan, phendia, "Pate chi dikhlem tu ando sado lesa?" 
John 18 27 O Petri pale phendia, "Chi zhanav les," ai strazo o kurkorsho bashadia.
John 18 28 Porme angerde le Jesusos katar o Caiaphas ka kher la krisako le guvernorosko kai keren kris: diminiatsi sas; numa le Zhiduvuria chi gele andre ando kher, saxke te na aven marime, ai te sai xan O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo. 
John 18 29 O Pilate anklisto avri te zhal karing lende, ai phendia, "Savatar dosh si tume pe kado manush?"
John 18 30 Ai won phende leske, "Te na avilino bi lasho, nas te anas les tute."
John 18 31 O Pilate phendia lenge, "Len les tume ai den les pe kris pala tumaro zakono. Le Zhiduvuria phende leske, "Amenge nai slobodo te mudares vari kas:" 
John 18 32 Kodia sas saxke te kerdiol e vorba kai O Jesus phendiasas, kana sikadia sar si te merel.
John 18 33 O Pilate gelo ando kher la krisako ai akhardia le Jesusos, ai phendia leske, "San tu o amperato le Zhidovongo?"
John 18 34 O Jesus dia les atweto, "Tu anda tute mothos kodia, vai le kolaver phende tuke pa mande?"
John 18 35 O Pilate dia les atweto, "Pate me sim Zhidovo? Chiro narodo ai le bare rasha andine tu mande; so kerdian tu?"
John 18 36 O Jesus phendia, "Murhi amperetsia nai ande kadia lumia; te avilino murhi amperetsia ande kadia lumia, antunchi murhe slugi marenaspe pala mande, saxke te na avav dino kal Zhiduvuria: Numa akana murhi amperetsia nai katse pe lumia.
John 18 37 O Pilate phendia leske, "No tu san amperato?" O Jesus phendia, "Tu mothos me sim amperato. Me arakhadilem ai avilem ande lumia, te phenav pa chachimos. Kon godi si le chachimasko ashunel murho glaso.
John 18 38 O Pilate phendia leske, "So si o chachimos?" Ai kana phendia kadia, anklisto avri pale te zhal karing le Zhiduvuria, ai phende lenge, "Me chi arakhav chi iek nasulimos ande leste." 
John 18 39 Numa sar si mashkar tumende iek zakono, te mekav vari kas tumenge kana si O Dies O Baro: mangen ma te mekav tumenge O Amperato le Zhidovongo?"
John 18 40 Pale savorhe tsipinas, "Nichi, na les, numa o Barabbas." Numa o Barabbas sas ek chor.
John 19 1 Antunchi O Pilate lia le Jesusos, ai kerdia te maren les le bichosa.  
John 19 2 Le ketani kerde andal kanrhe iek korona, ai tsode la pe lesko shero, ai dine pe leste iek rhocha brazbi. 
John 19 3 Porme pashile pasha leste, ai phende, "Droboitu, Amperato le Zhidogongo!" ai denas les palmi po mui.
John 19 4 O Pilate pale ankliste avri, ai phendia le Zhidovonge, "Eta, anav les tumenge avri, saxke te zhanen ke chi arakhav ande leste chi iek nasulimos. 
John 19 5 Antunchi O Jesus anklisto avri la koronasa kai sas kanrhale, ai le rasha kai sas brazbi, ai o Pilate phendia lenge, "Eta, o manush!"
John 19 6 Numa kana le bare le rashange ai zhandari dikhle les, tsipinas, phenenas, "Karfon les, karfon les." O Pilate phendia lenge, "Len les tume, ai karfon les: ke me chi arakhav chi iek nasulimos ande leste."
John 19 7 Le Zhiduvuria phende leske, "Amen si ame iek zakono, ai pala amaro zakono wo trobul te merel; ke wo kerdia anda peste O Shav le Devlesko."
John 19 8 Kana o Pilate ashundia kodia, wo mai zurales darailo; 
John 19 9 ai pale gelo ando kher la krisako, ai phushlia katar O Jesus, "Katar san tu?" Numa O Jesus chi phendia kanch. 
John 19 10 O Pilate phendia leske, "Mansa chi des duma? Pate chi zhanes ke man si ma e putiera te karfon tu po trushul, ai ke si ma vi e putiera te mekav tu?"
John 19 11 O Jesus phendia, "Tut nas te avel tu chi iek putiera pe mande, te na avilino tu dini putiera opral: anda kudia kodo kai andia ma tute kerel iek mai baro bezex.
John 19 12 Pala kodia o Pilate mangelas te mekel les, numa le Zhiduvuria tsipinas, phenenas, "Te mekesa les, tu chi san o vortako le Caesarosko: ke kon godi kerel anda peste amperato, wo kerel anda peste o duzhmano le Caesarosko. 
John 19 13 O Pilate kana ashundia kodia, andia le Jesusos avri, ai beshlo tele po skamin la krisako po tsan kai bushol o Bax, ai Zhidovisko Gabbatha. 
John 19 14 Antunchi sas e vriama kai lasharenas O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo, ai pashte mizmeri sas: O Pilate phendia le Zhidovonge, "Dikh, tumaro Amperato!"
John 19 15 Numa won tsipinas, "Mudar les, Mudar les, Karfosar les po trushul." O Pilate phendia lenge, "Tume mangen ma te mudarav tumare amperatos?" Le bare rasha phenenas, "Amaro amperato si o Caesar."
John 19 16 Antunchi dia les lende te karfon les. Won line le Jesus, ai ingerde les. 
John 19 17 O Jesus ingerelas pesko trushul, ai areslo po tsan kai bushol shero, ai Zhidovisko mothonas Golgotha: 
John 19 18 ai kotse karfosarde les, ai dui aver manush sas lesa, iek pal dui riga, ai O Jesus mashkaral.
John 19 19 O Pilate ramosardiape vari soste, ai thodia po trushul, ai kodo ramomos motholas, "O JESUS ANDAI NAZARETH, O AMPERATO LE ZHIDOVONGO." 
John 19 20 But Zhiduvuria jinde so sas ramome: ke o than kai O Jesus sas karfome pasha foro sas: ai ramome sas Zhidovisko, Grechisko ai Latinesko. 
John 19 21 Le bare le rashange phende le Pilatoske, "Na ramosar, O Amperato Le Zhidovongo; numa ramosar ke wo phendia, 'Me sim O Amperato le Zhidovongo.'"
John 19 22 O Pilate phendia, "So me ramosardem, trobul te beshel ramome."
John 19 23 Le ketani, kana karfosarde le Jesusos, line leske tsalia, ai kerde shtar kotora anda lende, iek kotor swakona ketanake; ai line vi leski raxami, kai nas suvdi, numa anda iek kotor sas de opral zhi tele.
John 19 24 Ai phende mashkar pende, "Na shinas la, numa thodepe te dikhen kon niril la," lela la: saxke te kerdiol so phendiasas E Vorba le Devleski, kai phenel, "Won hulade murhe tsalia mashkar pende, ai thodepe te dikhen kon niril murhi raxami." So kerde le ketani.
John 19 25 Pasha trushul le Jesusosko sas leski dei, ai e phei leska daki, e Maria e rhomni le Cleophaski, ai e Maria Magdalene. 
John 19 26 Kana O Jesus dikhlia peska da, ai pasha late o disiplo, kai sas leske drago, phenel peska dake, "Zhuvlio, Eta, cho shav!" 
John 19 27 Ai porme phendia le disiploske, "Eta, chi dei! ai antunchi kodia disiplo lia la ka lesko kher te beshel leste.
John 19 28 Pala kodia, O Jesus kai zhanelas ke vunzhe sa gata sas, saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski, wo phendia, "Trushalo sim." 
John 19 29 Ai sas kotse iek piri chikaki pherdo shut. Le ketani bolde ieke ponzha pherdi shut, ai kana phangle la pe iek kotor khash kai bushol hisop, tsode la ka lesko wush. 
John 19 30 Kana o shut areslo pel le Jesusoske wush, wo phendia "Sa gata"; ai kana meklia o shero tele, mulo. 
John 19 31 Kodia sas iek dies mai anglal sar o Savato, ai le Zhiduvuria chi mangenas le staturia te beshen pel trushula Savatone, ke kodo Savato sas iek baro dies. Le Zhiduvuria mangenas katar o Pilate te phagen le punrhe kodolenge kai sas karfome, ai te len le pal trushula. 
John 19 32 Antunchi le ketani avile, ai phagle le punrhe le pervoneske, porme le kolavreske kai sas karfome lesa. 
John 19 33 Numa kana pashile pasha Jesus, ai dikhle ke vunzhe mulo sas, chi phagle leske punrhe. 
John 19 34 Numa iek andal ketani kerdia gropa ande lesko prashav la sabiasa, ai strazo anklisto rat avri ai pai. 
John 19 35 O manush kai dikhlia le mothol pa kadala dieli kai kerdile, ai so mothol o chachimos si; wo zhanel ke mothol o chachimos, saxke te pachan tume. 
John 19 36 Kadala dieli kerdile, saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski, chi iek kokola anda leske chi avela phaglo. 
John 19 37 Ai ande averik E Vorba le Devleski mai phenel, "Won dikhena kodoles kai xiviarde."
John 19 38 Pala kodia o Joseph andai Arimathea, kai sas ek disiplo le Jesusosko, numa chordanes ke daralas katar le Zhiduvuria, manglia katar o Pilate te sai lel o stato le Jesusosko: ai o Pilate phendia leske ke sai. Wo avilo ai lia o stato le Jesusosko. 
John 19 39 O Nicodemus avilo, kai mai anglal avilo sas e riate ka Jesus, ai andia pashte trenda kili Mirrh ai Aloes amime andek than. 
John 19 40 Line o stato le Jesusosko, ai vuluisarde les andek vuzho poxtan, parno ai tsode andre aromat, ke kadia si o zakono le Zhidovongo te gropon. 
John 19 41 Ai sas iek sado pe kodo tsan kai sas O Jesus karfome; ai ande kodo sado sas iek nevo greposhevo, kai inker khonik nas thodino andre. 
John 19 42 Kotse thode le Jesusos ke sas O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo mai anglal sar o Savato le Zhidovongo, ai ke o greposhevo sas pashe.
John 20 1 Kurke diminiatsi, ai kana kerelas inker tuniariko, e Maria Magdalene geli ka greposhevo, ai dikhlia ke o bax sas lino katar o wudar. 
John 20 2 Woi nashli karing o Simon Petri, ai karing o kolaver disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusosko, ai phendia lenge, "Line le Devles anda greposhevo ai chi zhanas kai thode les." 
John 20 3 O Petri ai o kolaver disiplo gele, ai avile ka greposhevo. 
John 20 4 Vi le dui zhene nashenas andek than: numa o kolaver disiplo nashelas mai zurales katar o Petri, ai areslo pervo ka greposhevo. 
John 20 5 Bandilo tele ai dikhlia o poxtan o parno kai sas pe phuv; numa chi gelo andre. 
John 20 6 O Simon Petri lelaspe pala leste areslo, ai gelo andre ando greposhevo, ai dikhlia o poxtan o parno kai sas pe phuv. 
John 20 7 Ai e kotor dirza kai thode sas po shero le Jesusosko, nas le poxtanosa le parnesa, numa pakhuime sas rigate ande kolaverik. 
John 20 8 Antunchi le kolaver disiplo, kai areslo sas o pervo ka greposhevo, gelo vi wo andre, ai dikhlia, ai pachaiape. 
John 20 9 Ke chi haliarenas inker ke E Vorba le Devleski motholas ke O Kristo trobulas te zhuvindil mashkar le mule.
John 20 10 Ai le disipluria geletar porme khere. 
John 20 11 Numa e Maria beshelas avri pasha greposhevo ai rovelas: numa ande kodia kai rovelas, bandili tele te dikhel ando greposhevo. 
John 20 12 Ai dikhlia duie angelon kai sas vuriarde ando parno, ai beshenas tele po than kai sas thodino o stato le Jesusosko. Iek beshelas ka shero ai o kolaver kal punrhe.
John 20 13 Ai phende lake, "Zhuvlio, Sostar roves?" Ai woi phendia lenge, "Me rovav ke line murhe Devles, ai chi zhanen kai thode les!" 
John 20 14 Ai kana phendia kadia, woi boldinisaili, ai dikhlia le Jesusos ande punrnende; numa woi chi zhanelas ke sas O Jesus.
John 20 15 O Jesus phendia lake, "Zhuvlio, Sostar roves? Kas rodes?" Ai woi gindilas ke wo sas o manush kai lel sama katar o sado, phenel leske, "Gazda, te lian les vari kai, phen mange kai thodian les, ai me lava les."
John 20 16 O Jesus phendia lake, "Maria!" ai woi boldinisaili, ai phendia leske Zhidovesko, "Rabboni!" kodia znachil, Gazda.
John 20 17 O Jesus phendia lake, "Na azba ma; ke inker chi gelem ka murho Dat; numa zha ka murhe phral, ai phen lenge mange, "Ke ma zhav ka murho Dat, ai tumaro Dat; ka murho Del ai tumaro Del."
John 20 18 E Maria Magdalene geli ai phendia le disiplonge ke dikhlia le Devles, ai ke phendia lake kadala dieli.
John 20 19 Pozno sas o pervo dies le kurkosko, le disipluria chidinesas andek than ande iek kher, ai phandadesas le wudara zurales ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria, O Jesus avisailo mashkar lende, ai phendia lenge, "E pacha te avel tumensa." 
John 20 20 Ai kana phendia lenge kadala vorbi, wo sikadia lenge peske vas ai pesko prashav. Le disipluria raduisaile, kana dikhle le Devles. 
John 20 21 O Jesus mai phendia lenge, "E pacha te avel tumensa, sar murho Dat tradia man, i me tradav tumen." 
John 20 22 Ai kana phendia kodia divano, phurdia pe lende, ai phendia lenge, "Premin O Swunto Duxo: 
John 20 23 Te iertina tume le bezexa le manushenge, lenge bezexa avena iertime; te na iertin le, chi aven iertime."
John 20 24 Numa o Thomas, kai akharenas les Didimus, iek andal desh  dui disipluria, nas lensa kana O Jesus avisailo. 
John 20 25 Le kolaver disipluria phende leske, "Ame dikhliam le Devles." Numa wo phendia lenge, "Te na dikhava ande leske vas le semnuria le karfiango, ai te na tsava murho nai andel semnuria le karfiange, ai te na tsava murho vas ande lesko prashav, chi pachava."
John 20 26 Oxto dies pala kodia le disipluria le Jesusoske sas pale ando kher ai o Thomas sas lensa: O Jesus avisailo, le wudara phandadesas zurales, numa O Jesus avilo mashkar lende, ai phendia, "E pacha te avel tumensa." Porme phendia le Thomasoske, "Tho cho nai kata, ai dikh murhe vas; an vi cho vas ai tho les ande murho prashav: ai na kerdiol manush kai chi pachalpe, numa pachas tu."
John 20 27 O Thomas phendia leske, "Murho Devla ai murho Del,"
John 20 28 O Jesus phendia leske, "Tu dikhlian man anda kodia pachaian tu: numa raduime kodola kai chi dikhle ai kai pachaiepe."
John 20 29 O Jesus mai kerdia angla peske disipluria but aver mirakluria, kai nai ramome ande kadia klishka.
John 20 30 Numa kadala dieli sas ramome, saxke te pachan tume ke O Jesus si O Kristo, O Shav le Devlesko; ai kana pachan tume te avel tume o traio ande lesko anav.
John 21 1 Pala kodia O Jesus mai avisailo le disiplonge pashai maria kai bushol Tiberias; ai eta, sar avisailo lenge. 
John 21 2 O Simon Petri, ai o Thomas kai akharenas les Didimus, ai o Nathanael andai Cana kai si ande Galilee, ai le shav le Zebedeske, ai dui aver disipluria le Jesusoske sas andek than.
John 21 3 O Simon Petri phendia lenge, "Me zhav te astarav mashe." Ai won phende leske, "Vi ame zhas tusa." Ankliste avri, ai ankliste andek paraxoditsi; numa kodia riat chi astarde khanch.
John 21 4 Kana phuterdilo o dies, O Jesus sas pashai maria pe chishai; numa le disipluria chi zhanenas ke O Jesus sas.
John 21 5 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Shavorhale, nai tume khanchi te xan?"ai won dine les atweto, "Nichi."
John 21 6 Ai phendia lenge, "Shuden e sita pe rik e chachi le paraxodoski ai arakhena mashe." Won shude, ai nashti mai ankalavenas e sita avri de but mashe kai sas.
John 21 7 Antunchi o disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusoske phendia le Petreske, "Devla si" ai kana o Simon Petri ashundia ke O Del si, lia pe peste peske tsalia, ai thodia peske prashtia (ke nango sas), ai shudiape ande maria. 
John 21 8 Ai le kolaver disipluria avile ande paraxodoski, tsirdenas e sita kai sas pherdo mashe, ke nas dur katar o bedigo, iek shel meteria sas. (200 cubits). 
John 21 9 Kana huliste pe phuv, dikhle kotse angara dine iag, ai masho sas opral, ai sas vi manrho.
John 21 10 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Anen mashe kai astardian akana.
John 21 11 O Simon Petri anklisto anda paraxodo, ai andia pe phuv e sita pherdo iek shel ai panvardesh bare mashe: ai marka ke sas but, e sita chi shindili. 
John 21 12 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Aven ai xan." Ai chi iek andal disipluria chi tromailo te phushel lestar, "Kon san tu?" ke anenas ke O Del si. 
John 21 13 O Jesus pashilo, lia o manrho, ai dia len, ai porme lia o masho ai dia len. 
John 21 14 Kodia sas e trito data kai O Jesus sikadiolaspe peske disiplonge, de sar zhuvindisailo sas mashkar le mule.
John 21 15 Kana getosarde te xan, O Jesus phendia le Simonoske Petri, "Simon, shav le Jonasosko, san tuke drago mange mai but sar kodola?" Ai wo phendia leske, "E Devla, tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke." O Jesus phendia leske, "Le sama katar murhe bakriorha."
John 21 16 Ai mai phendia leske pe duito data, "Simon, shav le Jonasosko, san tuke drago mange?" O Petri phendia leske, "E Devla, Tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke." O Jesus phendia leske, "Le sama katar murhe bakriorha."
John 21 17 Ai mai phendia leske pe trito data, "Simon, shav le Jonasosko, san tuke drago mange?" O Petri nekezhisailo anda so phendia leske pe trito data, "San tuke drago mange?" ai phendia leske, "Devla, tu zhanes swako fielo; tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke." O Jesus phendia leske, "Le sama katar murhe bakriorha." 
John 21 18 " Chachimasa, chachimasa, me phenav tuke, kana sanas mai terno, tu thosas pe tute e prashtia, ai zhasas kai tu mangesas; numa kana avesa phuro, tu vazdesa che vas opre, ai aver thola e prashtia pe tute, ai ingerela tu kai tu chi mangesa te zhas." 
John 21 19 Wo phendia kadia te sikavel sar o Petri merela ai luvudila le Devles. Porme kana phendia kodo divano, phendia leske, "Le tu pala mande."
John 21 20 O Petri, kana boldinisailo, dikhlia ke lelaspe pala lende o disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusosko. Kodo kai thodiasas pe po kolin le Jesusosko kana xanas, ai phushliasas lestar, "Devla, savo si kodo kai si te purhil tu?" 
John 21 21 Kana o Petri dikhlia les phendia le Jesusosko, "Devla, so kerdiolape kodo manush?"
John 21 22 O Jesus phendia leske, "Te mangava te traiil zhi kai avava palpale, soi tuke kotsar? Le tu pala mande." 
John 21 23 Kodia viasta geli antunchi mashkar le phral, ke kodia disiplo chi merela: Numa O Jesus chi phendiasas le Petreske, ke chi merela; numa phendia, te mangava te traiil zhi kai avav palpale, soi tuke kotsar?"
John 21 24 No kodia disiplo si kai phenel pa kadala dieli kai kerdile, ai kai ramosardia le; ai ame zhanas ke so phendia si chacho. 
John 21 25 O Jesus mai kerdia but aver dieli, te ramosardiamas le, divano pe divanoste, me gindiv ke sa e lumia nashtisardino te inkerel le klishki kai ramosardamas. Amen.
Acts 1 1 Theophilus, dem duma ande murhi pervo klishka pa sa le dieli kai O Jesus nachinaisardia te kerel ai te sicharel de anda gor, 
Acts 1 2 zhi ka dies kai gelotar ando rhaio, ai kai dia ordina katar O Swunto Duxo le apostlonge kai alosardiasas; 
Acts 1 3 pala peske martia sikadilo lenge zhuvindo, ai sikadia lenge butivar ke zhuvindolo ke beshlo lensa shtarvardesh dies, ai delas duma lensa pal dieli le amperetsia le Devleski. 
Acts 1 4 Andek dies kai sas lensa O Jesus phendia lenge, "Te na zhan anda Jerusalem, numa te azhukeren so lesko Dat shinadiasas lenge. Tume ashundian tumenge pe kadia. 
Acts 1 5 Ke o Iovano boldia ando paiesa, numa tume pa xantsi dies avena bolde le Swuntone Duxosa."
Acts 1 6 Kana le disipluria ai O Jesus sas andek than, won pushle les, "Devla, Kana si kadia vriama kai anesa palpale e amperetsia ka Israel?"
Acts 1 7 O Jesus phendia lenge, "Nai tumendar te zhanen e vriama vai le diesa, ke ferdi O Dat si les e putiera te phenel kana kerdiol. 
Acts 1 8 Numa tume avena pherde putierasa kana O Swunto Duxo avela pe tumende, ai avena murhe marturia ande Jerusalem, ai ande sa Judea, ai Samaria, ai pe sa e lumia."
Acts 1 9 Kana phendia kodo divano, O Jesus gelotar ando rhaio, andek nuvero angla lenge iakha.
Acts 1 10 Ai sar dikhenas po cheri sar zhaltar O Jesus, eta, dui manush kai sas vuliarde ando parno sikadile lenge; 
Acts 1 11 ai phende lenge, "Tume kai san anda Galilee, sostar dikhen po cheri? O Jesus kai sas lino tumendar ando rhaio avela palpale sakadia sar tume dikhlian les te zhaltar ando rhaio."
Acts 1 12 Antunchi gele palpale ando Jerusalem anda E Plaiin le Maslinenge kai si pashai Jerusalem sar lel iek dies le Savatosko te zhal. 
Acts 1 13 Kana aresle, gele andek soba opre kai beshenas o Petri, o Iakov, ai o Iovano, ai o Andre, o Filip, ai o Thomas, o Bartholomew, ai o Mate, o Iakov o shav le Alphaeusosko, ai o Simon (o zealot), ai o Judas o shav le Iakovosko. 
Acts 1 14 Ai savo andek than rhuginas pe chachimasa, le zhuvliansa, ai e Maria e dei le Jesusoski, ai leske phral.
Acts 1 15 Ai andek dies ande kodia vriama o Petri wushtilo opre mashkar le disiplonge, ai phendia, won sas chidine andek than sas iek shel ai bish, 
Acts 1 16 "Murhe phral, o ramomos trobulas te kerdiol, so O Swunto Duxo ande Vorba le Devleski phendiasas mai anglal katar o mui le Davidosko pa Judas, kai dia O Jesus ando lengo vas te astaren les. 
Acts 1 17 O Judas sas mashkar amende, ke alosardiasas te kerel buchi amensa.
Acts 1 18 Le lovensa kai dine les te purhisar O Jesus. O Judas chindia peske iek kimpo, ai amboldia pe o shero pervo, ai lesko stato pharhadilo mashkaral, ai sa lesko porha ankliste avri. 
Acts 1 19 Sa o narodo anda Jerusalem ashunde so kerdilia, ai akharde kodole kimpos ande penge shib Acel'dama kodia znachil, O Kimpo le Ratesko.
Acts 1 20 Ke te si ramome andel Psalms, te kerdiol lesko kher sar iek pusta, ai "Te na beshel khonik ande kodo kher; ai aver manush te lel lesko than te kerel buchi." 
Acts 1 21 "Trobul o manush te avel pala amende te avel marturo anda zhuvindimos le Jesusosko. Kodo manush trobul te avel iek ando kodola kai sas mashkar amende sagda kai O Jesus phirdia amensa, 
Acts 1 22 de katar e vriama kai o Iovano boldia les ai zhi ka dies kai O Jesus gelotar mashkar amendar ando rhaio.
Acts 1 23 Andine le duien manushen, o Josef kai busholas Barsabbas, ai vi akharenas les Justus, ai o Matthias. 
Acts 1 24 Ai rhugisaile ai phende, "Devla, tu kai zhanes sa le ile, savo anda kakala dui manush alosardian, 
Acts 1 25 te len o than ande kadia buchi sar ek Apostle, o than kai o Judas meklia te zhal ka pesko than ke kerdia bezex." 
Acts 1 26 Antunchi kerde vari so te alon iekes andel dui, ai o Matthias sas alome; ai thodinosas andel desh u iek disiplonsa.
Acts 2 1 Panvardesh dies kai sas Pentecost savorhe sas ande iek than.
